flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
By catching the aura emanating
from others, it can read their
thoughts and movements.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A well-trained one can sense auras
to identify and take in the feelings
of creatures over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It’s said that no foe can remain invisible
to LUCARIO, since it can detect auras.
Even foes it could not otherwise see.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It’s said that no foe can remain invisible
to LUCARIO, since it can detect auras.
Even foes it could not otherwise see.
flavor_text_entries.black:
A well-trained one can sense auras
to identify and take in the feelings
of creatures over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.white:
A well-trained one can sense auras
to identify and take in the feelings
of creatures over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
By reading the auras of all things,
it can tell how others are feeling
from over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
By reading the auras of all things,
it can tell how others are feeling
from over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.x:
By catching the aura emanating from others, it can
read their thoughts and movements.
flavor_text_entries.y:
By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how
others are feeling from over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
By catching the aura emanating from others, it can
read their thoughts and movements.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how
others are feeling from over half a mile away.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Not only does it perceive auras, but it has also
gained the power to control them. It employs
them in battle.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
They can detect the species of a living being—
and its emotions—from over half a mile away.
They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It concentrates its mental energy and fires off
mysterious waves called auras, which can crush
boulders of large size to dust.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Lucario reads its opponent’s feelings with its
aura waves. It finds out things it would rather
not know, so it gets stressed out easily.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It controls waves known as auras, which are
powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks.
It uses these waves to take down its prey.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers
who have justice in their hearts can earn this
Pokémon’s trust.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and
controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway
beings. I have given the name ”aura” to this power.
